user.title: Nanoleaf Essentials Setup
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Nanoleaf Essentials device.

link.title: Connect to Nanoleaf Essentials
link.description: Please go into the Nanoleaf APP to: More -> My Devices -> and to the Essentials Light - make sure you are connected (e.g.: via Bluetooth) and choose the "three dots" and then preferences, then choose "connect to the API". After this was done press "OK" within {timeout} seconds.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is online.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication token. Please try the setup process again.
error.timeout_connect: Timeout connecting to device or API key request timed out. Please ensure you enabled API access in the Nanoleaf app within the time limit.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
